name: Digital Dispatch
description:
Digital Dispatch is a virtual reality application for Meta Quest with the purpose of representing how the TCP/IP stack works. Specifically, its goal is to metaphorically explain the protocols of each layer through engaging graphics and immersive interactions.

The aim is to help teachers show how the Internet works to their student!

CONTROLS
  • use the Thumbsticks to teleport
  • use the "GRIP" button to grab
ADDITIONAL ASSETS
  • Oculus XR Toolkit: https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.xr.interaction.toolkit@2.3/manual/in...
  • Dotween:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/dotween-hotween-v2-27676

Digital Dispatch is an University project created and developed for the Virtual Reality course at Politecnico di Torino.

The developers and members of the team are:

  • Chessa Davide
  • Garibaldi Daniela
  • Iozzia Diego Alberto
  • Lelli GIan Marco

The application is only available in Italian.
